means: [艺] 现实主义的，[哲]实在论（者）的

sentence.Network_en: He does not have any realistic chance of winning the election.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有一点儿赢得选举的现实机会。

sentence.Network_en: These proposals represent a realistic starting point for negotiation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些建议是谈判的现实出发点。

sentence.Network_en: I can commend it to him as a realistic course of action.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以把这作为一个切实可行的处理方法推荐给他。

PerfectNetExp.abs: · 现实的（realistic）(Realistic)――要确保有足够的人力、财力、和其它物质资源来实现。· 按时完成(Time specific)。
形容人性格的词汇 ... rational 有理性的 realistic 实事求是的 reasonable 讲道理的.
现实（REALISTIC）-想在第一笔交易中就获利100万不大现实。 可测（MEASURABLE）-易量化。
英语词汇的奥秘 ... humanistic 人道主义的 realistic 现实主义的 antagonistic 敌对的.

list.abs: realistic accuracy 实际精度realistic model 仿真模型realistic well condition 实际井况
电影词汇（中英文对照） ... realism，realistic film 写实主义，写实主义电影 realist cinema 写实主义电影 recordist 录音指导.
英美文学史复习... ... Denial Defoe 丹尼尔。笛福 realistic novel 现实主义小说他爸叫 Foe Novel:Robinson Crusoe 鲁滨逊漂流记.
Researching and solve these problems conscientiously has very important realistic meanings ., 认真研究解决这些问题具有十分重要的现实意义.

entry.tran: 现实的;务实的;实事求是的
entry.def: If you are realistic about a situation, you recognize and accept its true nature and try to deal with it in a practical way.

example.ex: Police have to be realistic about violent crime...
example.tran: 警方需要对暴力犯罪持务实态度。

example.ex: It's only realistic to acknowledge that something, some time, will go wrong.
example.tran: 只有承认有些事情在某些时候会出问题才是现实的。

entry.tran: （目标或目的等）现实的，明智的，能实现的
entry.def: Something such as a goal or target that is realistic is one which you can sensibly expect to achieve.

example.ex: Multi-party elections are scheduled for sometime next year but many doubt that this is a realistic goal...
example.tran: 多党选举计划在明年某个时间进行，但是许多人怀疑这个目标是否现实。

example.ex: A more realistic figure is eleven million...
example.tran: 更加实际一点的数字是1,100万。

entry.tran: （绘画、小说或电影）现实主义风格的，写实的，逼真的
entry.def: You say that a painting, story, or film is realistic when the people and things in it are like people and things in real life.

example.tran: 关于印第安人的极为逼真的绘画

example.ex: The language is foul and the violence horribly realistic.
example.tran: 语言污秽，暴力场面非常写实。

means.word_mean: 1. aware or expressing awareness of things as they really are;

sentences.sentence: "the actors tried to create a realistic portrayal of the Africans"

means.word_mean: 2. representing what is real; not abstract or ideal;
3. of or relating to the philosophical doctrine of realism;

auth_sentence.content: That's a realistic philosophy and a practical plan.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's a realistic philosophy and a practical plan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's a realistic philosophy and a practical plan.

auth_sentence.content: How to meet press deadlines and set realistic goals.
auth_sentence.res_content: How to meet press deadlines and set realistic goals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How to meet press deadlines and set realistic goals.

auth_sentence.content: We want to be realistic with all of you.
auth_sentence.res_content: We want to be realistic with all of you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We want to be realistic with all of you.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真的, 真实的, 不动产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: real真实,现实→adj.真的, 真实的, 不动产的
realist[n.现实主义者]+ic……的→adj.现实[主义]的
un不+real真实,现实→adj.不真实的, 虚幻的
real真实,现实+ly表副词→adv.真正地, 实在地
real真实,现实+ism主义→realism现实主义
real真实,现实+ist人→n.现实主义者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实, 事实, 本体, 逼真
stems_affixes.word_buile: real真实,现实+ity表名词→n.真实, 事实, 本体, 逼真

stems_affixes.value_cn: 认识到, 了解, 实现, 实行
stems_affixes.word_buile: real真实,现实+ize表动词→v.认识到, 了解, 实现, 实行

Sentence.sentence: Meditation (静思) techniques, in contrast, can teach people to put their shortcomings into a larger, more realistic perspective.
As anyone who has tried to lose weight knows, realistic goal-setting generally produces the best results.
That's partially because it appears people who set realistic goals actually work more efficiently, and exert more effort, to achieve those goals
Setting realistic goals can turn a failing business into success.

means.word_mean: 现实的, 实际可行的; 现实主义的

sentences.en: Our income has got smaller, so we must be realistic and give up our car.
sentences.cn: 我们的收入减少了, 所以我们得面对现实, 把车卖掉。
